div.p: In the example below we create two classes HolloWorldConsumer and HelloWorldProducer each of which runs in its own thread. The Producer sends TextMessage objects via a MessageProducer instance to the ActiveMQ broker. The Consumer receives messages asynchronously from the broker on the same Topic or Queue as the Producer looking for a set number of TextMessages to arrive.
